title: Cost of an angioplasty in various countries 2019
summary: This bar chart has 13 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Cost in U.S. dollars in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Cost in U.S. dollars 28200.0 is found at Country United States and the minimum is found at Thailand where Country is 4200.0.
There is a difference of 24000.0 between the maximum Country United States and minimum Country Thailand.
